I'm getting an error
It says "Failed to load dll" it asks for a file called "mono"

@wizzard4all Do you have the minimum specs to run the game?see if you have enough RAM memory.
Also try replacing the mono.dll from your computer.You could try a dll fixer which will automatically find the problem and fix it or replace the file manually,I found the file here  dllwindows.com/download/mono-dll (just add the www in front)
